description:
The name of each officer of the City and County of San Francisco with whom a lobbyist made a contact.  

Contacts of public officials are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Ethics Commission on a monthly basis.  This dataset updates automatically every night.

name: Lobbyist Activity - Contacts of Public Officials
